sentences.sContent: The twins are so alike that it’s easy to muddle them up.
sentences.sCn: 这对双胞胎看上去太像了，很容易弄混。

sentences.sContent: Spanish and Italian are very similar and I sometimes get them muddled up .
sentences.sCn: 西班牙语和意大利语很相似，我有时会把它们弄混。

synos.tran: 混合；使咬字不清晰；使微醉

remMethod.val: mud(泥浆) + dle → 混入泥浆 → 混乱

words.tran: 糊涂的；混乱的；头脑昏昏然的
使污浊；使沾上泥；把…弄糊涂

trans.tranCn: 混合, 使微醉, 使咬字不清晰, 鬼混
trans.tranOther: to confuse one person or thing with another, and make a mistake
